character.name: Dougie
character.description:
<c=D97754>DOUGIE</c> 
Your bioengineer. His cards create <c=midrow>cell colonies</c>, which can be <c=keyword>harvested</c> or <c=keyword>mutated</c> to powerful effects.

Apoptosis.name: APOPTOSIS
Apoptosis.description: <c=midrow>Cell colonies</c> fire for {0} damage immediately after being <c=action>harvested</c>.

description.None: Destroy all unmutated <c=midrow>cell colonies</c>. Create new ones next to survivors.
description.A: Destroy all unmutated <c=midrow>cell colonies</c>. Create new ones next to survivors.
description.B: Create <c=midrow>cell colonies</c> next to existing ones.

description.None: Launch a <c=midrow>cell</c>. Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=CC6641>Dougie</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Launch a <c=midrow>cell</c>. Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=CC6641>Dougie</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Launch a <c=midrow>cell</c>. Add 1 of 4 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=CC6641>Dougie</c> cards to your hand.

ExtendoGrip.name: EXTENDO-GRIP
ExtendoGrip.description: Increases the range of <c=action>cell harvest</c> by 1 space.

GrowthHormones.name: GROWTH HORMONES
GrowthHormones.description: The first <c=midrow>cell colony</c> launched each combat is <c=action>F. Mutated</c>.

HotDog.name: HOT DOG!
HotDog.description: At the start of combat, gain a <c=card>Meat Grinder</c>.

Polydactyly.name: POLYDACTYLY
Polydactyly.description: Draw <c=card>+1 card</c> every turn if there is a <c=midrow>cell colony</c> in front of your <c=part>missile bay</c> or <c=part>cockpit</c>.

Parasitoid.name: PARASITOID
Parasitoid.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>All cards become <c=cardtrait>Symbiotic</c>.</c> 2 <c=midrow>cell colonies</c> will always be near your ship at the start of combat.

Cell.name: Cell Colony
Cell.description: Will block 1 shot before being destroyed.

MutateAllA.name: A. Mutation
MutateAllA.description: Mutates all <c=midrow>cell colonies</c>. Mutated <c=midrow>cell colonies</c> will shoot a 1 damage shot once per turn.

MutateAllX.name: X. Mutation
MutateAllX.description: Mutates all <c=midrow>cell colonies</c>. Mutated <c=midrow>cell colonies</c> will shoot a 2 damage shot once per turn.

MutateAllD.name: D. Mutation
MutateAllD.description: Mutates all <c=midrow>cell colonies</c>. Mutated <c=midrow>cell colonies</c> will beam <c=status>1 SHIELD</c> at their target once per turn.

MutateAllF.name: F. Mutation
MutateAllF.description: Mutates all <c=midrow>cell colonies</c>. Mutated <c=midrow>cell colonies</c> can be <c=action>harvested</c> 1 more time before being destroyed.

Symbiotic.name: Symbiotic
Symbiotic.description: This card costs +1 energy if not within harvesting range of a <c=midrow>cell colony</c>.
